#| label: setup

source(here::here("R/quarto-setup.R"))

<!-- %:::% list-of-abbreviations body begin %:::% -->
~F~
: \hspace{20cm} Subscript indicating a relation with work-free days

~W~
: \hspace{20cm} Subscript indicating a relation with workdays

BT
: \hspace{20cm} Local time of going to bed

FD
: \hspace{20cm} Number of work-free days per week

GU
: \hspace{20cm} Local time of getting out of bed

HO
: \hspace{20cm} Horne & Ostberg's morningness-eveningness questionnaire (same as _MEQ_)

LE
: \hspace{20cm} Light exposure

LE~week~
: \hspace{20cm} Average weekly light exposure

MCTQ
: \hspace{20cm} Munich ChronoType Questionnaire

MCTQ^PT^
: \hspace{20cm} Portuguese version of the MCTQ

MEQ
: \hspace{20cm} Morningness-Eveningness Questionnaire

MSF
: \hspace{20cm} Midsleep on work-free days. Local time of the midpoint between sleep onset and sleep end on work-free days

MSF~sc~
: \hspace{20cm} Midsleep on work-free days with a sleep correction -- MCTQ's chronotype proxy. Same as MSF with a sleep correction (~SC~) made when a possible sleep compensation related to a lack of sleep on workdays is identified.

MSW
: \hspace{20cm} Midsleep on workdays. Local time of the midpoint between sleep onset and sleep end on workdays.

PRC
: \hspace{20cm} Phase response curve

SD
: \hspace{20cm} Sleep duration

SD~week~
: \hspace{20cm} Average weekly sleep duration

SE
: \hspace{20cm} Local time of sleep end

SI
: \hspace{20cm} "Sleep inertia". Despite the name, this abbreviation represents the time that a person takes to get up after sleep end. It is used this way by the MCTQ authors.

SJL
: \hspace{20cm} Absolute social jetlag

SJL~rel~
: \hspace{20cm} Relative social jetlag

SJL~sc~
: \hspace{20cm} Jankowski's sleep-corrected social jetlag

SJL~sc-rel~
: \hspace{20cm} Jankowski's relative sleep-corrected social jetlag

Sloss~week~
: \hspace{20cm} Weekly sleep loss

SO
: \hspace{20cm} Local time of sleep onset

Slat
: \hspace{20cm} Sleep latency, i.e., time (duration) to fall asleep after deciding to sleep

SPrep
: \hspace{20cm} Local time of preparing to sleep

TBT
: \hspace{20cm} Total time in bed

WD
: \hspace{20cm} Number of workdays per week
<!-- %:::% list-of-abbreviations body end %:::% -->
